KevlarLigero.name: Light Kevlar
KevlarLigero.description: Light kevlar armor that provides basic protection without affecting mobility.

KevlarMedio.name: Medium Kevlar
KevlarMedio.description: Reinforced kevlar armor that offers balanced protection with moderate hindrance.

Exoesqueleto.name: Exoskeleton
Exoesqueleto.description: Advanced technological exoskeleton armor that provides maximum protection at the cost of reduced mobility.

Cuero.name: Leather
Cuero.description: Light leather armor that offers basic protection without affecting mobility.

Malla.name: Chainmail
Malla.description: Chainmail armor that provides good protection with moderate hindrance.

Placas.name: Plate Armor
Placas.description: Heavy metal plate armor that offers maximum protection at the cost of reduced mobility.

ArcoPrecision.name: Precision Bow
ArcoPrecision.description: High precision bow designed for long-range shooting.

BallestaLigera.name: Light Crossbow
BallestaLigera.description: Light and manageable crossbow, ideal for medium-range combat.

Revolver.name: Revolver
Revolver.description: Classic six-shot revolver, reliable and powerful.

PistolaSemiautomatica.name: Semi-automatic Pistol
PistolaSemiautomatica.description: Modern semi-automatic pistol with high-capacity magazine.

Subfusil.name: Submachine Gun
Subfusil.description: Compact submachine gun with high rate of fire.

Machete.name: Machete
Machete.description: Heavy machete ideal for melee combat.

EscopetaRecortada.name: Sawed-off Shotgun
EscopetaRecortada.description: Sawed-off shotgun with great stopping power at close range. Damage decreases with distance.

Katana.name: Katana
Katana.description: Japanese curved blade sword, sharp and deadly.

Sable.name: Saber
Sable.description: Cavalry saber with curved blade. Can be used one or two-handed.

ArcoCorto.name: Short Bow
ArcoCorto.description: Short and manageable bow, ideal for quick combat.

ArcoLargo.name: Long Bow
ArcoLargo.description: Long war bow with great range and power.

Ballesta.name: Crossbow
Ballesta.description: Heavy crossbow with great penetration power.

Baston.name: Staff
Baston.description: Sturdy wooden staff, useful for defense.

Cimitarra.name: Scimitar
Cimitarra.description: Curved sword of oriental origin, fast and lethal.

Cuchillo.name: Knife
Cuchillo.description: Combat knife, can be thrown at short distance.

Daga.name: Dagger
Daga.description: Double-edged dagger, perfect for quick and stealthy attacks.

EspadaCorta.name: Short Sword
EspadaCorta.description: Versatile short sword, balanced between speed and damage.

EspadaLarga.name: Long Sword
EspadaLarga.description: Classic long sword, the quintessential weapon of warriors.

HachaCombate.name: Battle Axe
HachaCombate.description: Two-handed war axe with great destructive power.

HachaGuerra.name: War Axe
HachaGuerra.description: One-handed war axe, brutal and effective.

Honda.name: Sling
Honda.description: Simple but effective sling for throwing projectiles.

LanzaLigera.name: Light Spear
LanzaLigera.description: Light spear that can be used in melee combat or thrown.

LanzaPesada.name: Heavy Lance
LanzaPesada.description: Heavy cavalry lance. Deals extra damage when used mounted (3d6).

Mandoble.name: Greatsword
Mandoble.description: Huge two-handed sword with devastating power.

Mangual.name: Flail
Mangual.description: Flail with chain and spiked ball, difficult to block.

Maza.name: Mace
Maza.description: Heavy metal mace, effective against armor.

Vara.name: Rod
Vara.description: Simple wooden rod, useful as improvised weapon.

Normal.name: Normal Shield
Normal.description: Light wooden or metal shield that provides basic protection without hindering movement.

Mediano.name: Medium Shield
Mediano.description: Medium-sized shield that offers good protection balancing defense and mobility.

Pesado.name: Heavy Shield
Pesado.description: Sturdy metal shield that provides excellent protection at the cost of some mobility.

Torre.name: Tower Shield
Torre.description: Massive shield that covers almost the entire body, offering maximum protection but significantly limiting movement.

Tactico.name: Tactical Shield
Tactico.description: Modern composite material shield used by special forces and riot police.

Antidisturbios.name: Riot Shield
Antidisturbios.description: Transparent polycarbonate shield designed for crowd control and police protection.

Ballistico.name: Ballistic Shield
Ballistico.description: Heavy reinforced shield capable of stopping firearm projectiles.

Energia.name: Personal Energy Shield
Energia.description: Portable device that generates a protective force field against physical and energy attacks.

CampoFuerza.name: Advanced Force Field
CampoFuerza.description: Latest generation energy shield system with high absorption capacity.

Deflector.name: Portable Deflector
Deflector.description: Light energy shield that deflects projectiles and laser attacks with minimal hindrance.

Doscabezas.name: Two-headed
Doscabezas.description: Monstrous beast with two heads that can attack multiple targets.

DragonGrande.name: Large Dragon
DragonGrande.description: Adult large dragon with resistant scales and devastating fire breath.

DragonPequeno.name: Small Dragon
DragonPequeno.description: Young dragon or wyvern with resistant scales and fire breath.

Esqueleto.name: Skeleton
Esqueleto.description: Undead animated by dark magic. Vulnerable to bludgeoning damage.

EsqueletoCaballero.name: Skeleton Knight
EsqueletoCaballero.description: Undead warrior with armor and martial training. More dangerous than a common skeleton.

Gargola.name: Gargoyle
Gargola.description: Animated stone creature that can fly. Its stone skin protects it from physical attacks.

Goblin.name: Goblin
Goblin.description: Small and cunning creature that usually attacks in groups. Cowardly when alone.

Arpia.name: Harpy
Arpia.description: Winged creature with woman's torso and bird of prey body. Its song can enchant the unwary.

HombreLagarto.name: Lizardman
HombreLagarto.description: Agile and territorial reptilian humanoid. Excellent swimmer.

HombreRata.name: Ratman
HombreRata.description: Rodent humanoid that inhabits sewers and tunnels. Fast and elusive.

Liche.name: Lich
Liche.description: Undead wizard of great power. Master of necromantic magic.

Lobo.name: Wolf
Lobo.description: Wild predator that hunts in packs. Fast and lethal.

LordEsqueleto.name: Skeleton Lord
LordEsqueleto.description: Elite undead warrior with full armor and superior combat skills.

LordLiche.name: Lich Lord
LordLiche.description: Undead archmage of devastating power. Masters the darkest arcane arts.

Ogro.name: Ogre
Ogro.description: Brutal giant of great strength but little intelligence. Its thick skin absorbs damage.

Orco.name: Orc
Orco.description: Savage and aggressive warrior. Fights fiercely and fearlessly.

Troll.name: Troll
Troll.description: Large regenerative creature. Its thick skin absorbs damage and regenerates quickly.

Antorcha.name: Torch
Antorcha.description: Portable light source that illuminates 10 meters for 1 hour.

Cuerda.name: Rope (15m)
Cuerda.description: Sturdy hemp or fiber rope, useful for climbing or tying.

Mochila.name: Backpack
Mochila.description: Travel backpack with capacity to carry equipment and supplies.

Yesca.name: Tinder and Flint
Yesca.description: Basic kit for starting fire in normal conditions.

Odre.name: Waterskin
Odre.description: Leather container for transporting liquids, 2 liter capacity.

RacionesViaje.name: Travel Rations (1 day)
RacionesViaje.description: Preserved food sufficient for one person for one day.

Tienda.name: Tent
Tienda.description: Portable shelter for 2 people, protects from the elements.

KitEscalada.name: Climbing Kit
KitEscalada.description: Hooks, pitons and specialized equipment for ascents. Grants +2 to Climbing rolls.

HerramientasLadron.name: Thieves' Tools
HerramientasLadron.description: Lockpicks and tools for forcing locks. Necessary to use Traps/Locks.

KitCuracion.name: Healing Kit
KitCuracion.description: Bandages, ointments and medicinal herbs. Grants +2 to Medicine or Healing/Herbs rolls.

Linterna.name: Lantern
Linterna.description: Portable light source that illuminates 15 meters. Requires oil.

Catalejo.name: Spyglass
Catalejo.description: Portable telescope that allows seeing at great distance. Grants +2 to Notice/Spot at long distance.

Movil.name: Mobile Phone
Movil.description: Modern communication device with internet access and applications.

Portatil.name: Laptop
Portatil.description: Portable personal computer. Necessary for advanced Computer Science rolls.

Linterna LED.name: LED Flashlight
Linterna LED.description: Modern high-power flashlight that illuminates 30 meters for 8 hours.

KitMedicoModerno.name: Modern Medical Kit
KitMedicoModerno.description: Complete first aid kit with advanced medical supplies. Grants +3 to Medicine rolls.

ChalecoPrensa.name: Press Vest
ChalecoPrensa.description: Identification vest that can provide basic protection in conflict zones.

Binoculares.name: Binoculars
Binoculares.description: High-quality binoculars. Grants +3 to Notice/Spot at long distance.

GPS.name: GPS
GPS.description: Global positioning system. Grants +3 to Navigation rolls.

RadioComunicacion.name: Communication Radio
RadioComunicacion.description: Portable transceiver with 5 km range in open terrain.

KitForense.name: Forensic Kit
KitForense.description: Equipment for evidence collection. Grants +2 to Search rolls at crime scenes.

Dron.name: Reconnaissance Drone
Dron.description: Small unmanned aerial vehicle with camera for surveillance and exploration.

Datapad.name: Datapad
Datapad.description: Futuristic tablet with access to galactic databases and communication systems.

EscaneoBio.name: Biometric Scanner
EscaneoBio.description: Device that analyzes life forms and vital signs. Grants +3 to Medicine and Fauna.

Traductor.name: Universal Translator
Traductor.description: Real-time translation device for multiple languages and alien tongues.

KitReparacion.name: Advanced Repair Kit
KitReparacion.description: Tools and components for repairing advanced technology. Necessary for Engineering.

GeneradorCampo.name: Personal Field Generator
GeneradorCampo.description: Device that creates a temporary force field (1 use per day, absorbs 10 damage points).

Jetpack.name: Personal Jetpack
Jetpack.description: Personal propulsion device that allows limited flight (10 minutes autonomy).

VisorRA.name: Augmented Reality Visor
VisorRA.description: Glasses that overlay digital information on the environment. Grants +2 to Notice/Spot and Search.

Antigrav.name: Portable Antigravity Unit
Antigrav.description: Device that reduces weight of objects up to 100 kg. Grants +3 to Athletics for carrying.

DisiparMagia.name: Dispel Magic
DisiparMagia.description: Cancels an active magical effect. Difficulty equals original spell +2, and cost is the same as the spell to dispel.

ComunicacionDistancia.name: Long Distance Communication
ComunicacionDistancia.description: Allows two wizards using the spell simultaneously to communicate mentally.

ConvertirAgua.name: Convert Water
ConvertirAgua.description: Converts 1 liter per skill level into wine, beer, oil or ice.

Luz.name: Light
Luz.description: Illuminates a non-living object for 1 hour/level or emits a blinding ray that paralyzes 1 turn (Save: Perception 10).

ManoDeMago.name: Mage Hand
ManoDeMago.description: Telekinesis on objects up to 2 kg for 1 turn/level.

DetectarMagia.name: Detect Magic
DetectarMagia.description: Detects nearby traces, spells or magical objects and identifies their nature.

ToqueElectrico.name: Electric Touch
ToqueElectrico.description: Inflicts 2d6 damage ignoring armor (requires melee attack roll).

AmistadAnimal.name: Animal Friendship
AmistadAnimal.description: Turns an animal into an ally for 1 minute/level.

CaidaPluma.name: Feather Fall
CaidaPluma.description: An object or creature falls slowly (9 meters per turn) for 1 turn/level.

Convocatoria.name: Summons
Convocatoria.description: Notifies a known person of the mage's location and need.

Curacion.name: Healing
Curacion.description: Heals 1d6 HP for each mana point spent (maximum 3 points).

MaterializarArma.name: Materialize Weapon
MaterializarArma.description: Summons a physical weapon for 1 turn/level.

PiesArana.name: Spider Feet
PiesArana.description: Allows walking on any surface negating gravity for 1 turn/level.

ArmaFuego.name: Fire Weapon
ArmaFuego.description: Target weapon inflicts +1d6 fire damage for 1 turn/level.

Atravesar.name: Pass Through
Atravesar.description: Allows passing through solids up to 1 meter thick.

AuraCuracion.name: Healing Aura
AuraCuracion.description: Heals 2 HP per turn to all allies within 10 m radius for 1 turn/level.

Espejo.name: Mirror
Espejo.description: Returns the next received spell directly to its caster (lasts 1 day or until activated).

Invisibilidad.name: Invisibility
Invisibilidad.description: Lasts 1 minute/level or until the mage makes an attack.

RastroSecreto.name: Secret Trail
RastroSecreto.description: After touching a target, the mage sees an imaginary thread connecting them for 1 hour/level.

Silencio.name: Silence
Silencio.description: Generates a 1 m radius silence zone for 1 minute/level.

Amistad.name: Friendship
Amistad.description: The affected becomes an ally for 1 turn/level (Save: Intelligence 15).

InvocarLobo.name: Summon Wolf
InvocarLobo.description: Summons a wolf under the mage's orders for 1 turn/level (maximum one active).

AtarDemonio.name: Bind Demon
AtarDemonio.description: Immobilizes a demon for 1 turn/level (Save: Physical 18).

TentaculosNegros.name: Black Tentacles
TentaculosNegros.description: Immobilizes everything within 10 m radius for 1 turn/level (Save: Dexterity 15).

InfundirTerror.name: Instill Terror
InfundirTerror.description: Target flees or is paralyzed for 1 turn/level (Save: Intelligence 15).

EspejoSombras.name: Mirror of Shadows
EspejoSombras.description: Creates copies of the mage; attacks against them have 50% chance of failure for 1 turn/level.

Niebla.name: Fog
Niebla.description: Creates a 10x10 m area that subtracts -2 to visual Perception for 1 turn/level.

Absorcion.name: Absorption
Absorcion.description: Grants +4 to damage Absorption for 1 turn/level.

DefensaMental.name: Mental Defense
DefensaMental.description: Grants +4 to saving throws against magic for 1 turn/level.

AuraPoder.name: Aura of Power
AuraPoder.description: Grants +1 to hit and damage to all allies within 10 m radius for 1 turn/level.

BaileViento.name: Wind Dance
BaileViento.description: Grants +4 to Defense (also against projectiles) for 1 turn/level.

CaminarEntreSuenos.name: Walk Between Dreams
CaminarEntreSuenos.description: Travels to the dreams of someone known (Save: Intelligence 16).

Anticipacion.name: Anticipation
Anticipacion.description: Grants +2 to Defense and Attack for 1 turn/level.

AlzarMuertoViviente.name: Raise Undead
AlzarMuertoViviente.description: Raises a corpse under the mage's orders for 1 turn/level.

BolaFuego.name: Fireball
BolaFuego.description: Explosion of 3d6 damage in 5 m radius.

ToqueVampirico.name: Vampiric Touch
ToqueVampirico.description: Steals 2d6 HP from target and gives them to the mage; ignores armor.

CampoAntimagico.name: Antimagic Field
CampoAntimagico.description: Prevents casting magic within 10 m radius for 1 turn/level.

Terremoto.name: Earthquake
Terremoto.description: 10x10 m area; inflicts 2d6 damage and requires Save (Dexterity 15) to not fall.

RobarIdentidad.name: Steal Identity
RobarIdentidad.description: Copies victim's appearance for 1 hour/level (requires visual contact).

PosesionMental.name: Mental Possession
PosesionMental.description: Controls victim's body for 1 turn/level (Save: Intelligence 16); mage becomes unconscious.

Olvido.name: Oblivion
Olvido.description: Erases a memory (Save: Intelligence between 8 and 12 + spell level).

EsconderseSombras.name: Hide in Shadows
EsconderseSombras.description: Grants +10 to Stealth while there are shadows for 1 turn/level.

CadenaRelampagos.name: Chain Lightning
CadenaRelampagos.description: 2d6 damage ray that jumps to up to 3 targets ignoring armor.

RayoSolar.name: Solar Ray
RayoSolar.description: Fire aura that inflicts 4d6 damage in 5 m radius.

Duplicacion.name: Duplication
Duplicacion.description: Creates a copy with half HP; if one dies, the rest transfers to the other.

EscudoAntimagia.name: Anti-magic Shield
EscudoAntimagia.description: Blocks any spell attempting to pass through it for 1 turn/level.

OjosLince.name: Lynx Eyes
OjosLince.description: Allows repeating observed spells at the same level as the caster for 1 turn/level.

Teleportarse.name: Teleport
Teleportarse.description: Instant transport to a known position.

ArmasCuerpoACuerpo.name: Melee Weapons
ArmasCuerpoACuerpo.description: Experience in close combat with swords, axes, maces or unarmed combat and martial arts.

Atletismo.name: Athletics
Atletismo.description: Ability to run swiftly, perform running jumps or descend heights safely.

Fauna.name: Fauna
Fauna.description: Knowledge of animals, their habits and techniques to tame or domesticate them.

ArmasADistancia.name: Ranged Weapons
ArmasADistancia.description: Use and maintenance of bows, crossbows, firearms, whips or throwing knives.

Artilleria.name: Artillery
Artilleria.description: Handling of heavy weapons, cannons, missile launchers or spaceship weaponry.

Cabalgar.name: Riding
Cabalgar.description: Handling of horses and mounts, including galloping, jumping and controlling the animal in stressful situations.

Conducir.name: Driving
Conducir.description: Expert handling of ground vehicles like cars or motorcycles, useful in chases.

Escalar.name: Climbing
Escalar.description: Ascending vertical or steep walls with or without specialized equipment.

Esquivar.name: Dodge
Esquivar.description: Ability to avoid blows in combat; this value is the base for calculating the character's Defense.

Nadar.name: Swimming
Nadar.description: Ability to move in water; a single point allows swimming without risk in normal conditions.

Pilotar.name: Piloting
Pilotar.description: Aptitude for flying aircraft, performing emergency maneuvers and following flight protocols.

RobarBolsillos.name: Pickpocket
RobarBolsillos.description: Manual dexterity focused on discreetly stealing objects from bags, wallets or a victim's body.

Sigilo.name: Stealth
Sigilo.description: Ability to move silently or hide in shadows or crowds to avoid being seen.

TrampasCerraduras.name: Traps/Locks
TrampasCerraduras.description: Aptitude for forcing security mechanisms, opening locks and disabling traps.

Astrofisica.name: Astrophysics
Astrofisica.description: Theoretical knowledge of space physics, ship design and study of astrological phenomena.

Callejeo.name: Streetwise
Callejeo.description: Knowledge of the underworld, black market, urban crime and escape routes through alleys.

Comercio.name: Commerce
Comercio.description: Ability to appraise goods, know trade routes and conduct effective bargaining.

Criptografia.name: Cryptography
Criptografia.description: Ability to create and decipher complex codes or secret messages.

HistoriaTradicion.name: History / Tradition
HistoriaTradicion.description: Knowledge of past events, historical personalities, political geography and legends.

Idiomas.name: Languages
Idiomas.description: Ability to speak, read and learn languages other than native.

Informatica.name: Computer Science
Informatica.description: Use of computerized systems, programming, digital security and software creation.

Ingenieria.name: Engineering
Ingenieria.description: Knowledge in construction of artifacts, engines or robots (specialized according to setting).

Leyes.name: Law
Leyes.description: Knowledge of a region's legal system and ability to find legal loopholes.

Medicina.name: Medicine
Medicina.description: Treatment of diseases and wounds; a successful roll heals 1d6 HP (realistic) or 2d6 HP (heroic) once per day.

Navegar.name: Navigation
Navegar.description: Governing vessels, knowledge of sea routes and orientation by stars.

Ocultismo.name: Occultism
Ocultismo.description: Knowledge of arcane and mystical sciences; allows identifying when someone casts a spell.

Religion.name: Religion
Religion.description: Knowledge of theology, ceremonies, history and anthropology of religions.

SanacionHierbas.name: Healing/Herbs
SanacionHierbas.description: Use of natural resources to heal wounds; has the same mechanical effect as Medicine.

SupervivenciaCazar.name: Survival / Hunting
SupervivenciaCazar.description: Art of surviving in nature, including making fire, orientation and obtaining food.

AdvertirNotar.name: Notice/Spot
AdvertirNotar.description: Use of senses to detect hidden people, subtle noises or unusual details in the environment.

Bailar.name: Dancing
Bailar.description: Skill in dancing, fundamental in social environments, nightclubs or medieval courts.

Buscar.name: Search
Buscar.description: Thorough sensory focus to find hidden objects, secret passages or non-obvious clues.

Disfraz.name: Disguise
Disfraz.description: Ability to alter one's own appearance and go unnoticed or impersonate another person.

Etiqueta.name: Etiquette
Etiqueta.description: Knowledge of protocols, manners and correct behavior in various social strata or countries.

Musica.name: Music
Musica.description: Theoretical and practical knowledge of musical instruments and singing.

NavegacionEspacial.name: Space Navigation
NavegacionEspacial.description: Handling of stellar maps, plotting travel routes and knowledge of alien cultures.

Rastrear.name: Tracking
Rastrear.description: Ability to follow tracks, footprints or characteristic signs on terrain.

Reflejos.name: Reflexes
Reflejos.description: Quick physical reaction to unexpected events (like catching objects) and determination of attack speed.

Rumores.name: Rumors
Rumores.description: Ability to collect reliable information and gossip within a community.

Amenazar.name: Threaten
Amenazar.description: Pressuring someone through physical or psychological fears to obtain information or objects.

Interrogar.name: Interrogate
Interrogar.description: Extracting information through structured questions that force contradictions in the target.

Labia.name: Fast Talk
Labia.description: Convincing others that an argument is logical or true, regardless of reality.

Liderazgo.name: Leadership
Liderazgo.description: Persuading and directing groups of people through social or military command.

Regatear.name: Bargain
Regatear.description: Negotiating to achieve favorable prices in commercial transactions.

Seducir.name: Seduce
Seducir.description: Ability to be attractive or pleasant to another person to influence them.

EnableCarisma.Name: Enable Charisma
EnableCarisma.Hint: Activates the Charisma attribute and the 6 social skills. Requires world reload.

EnableMagia.Name: Enable Magic
EnableMagia.Hint: Activates the magic system, Mana points and spells. Requires world reload.

HealthMultiplier.Name: Health Multiplier
HealthMultiplier.Hint: Multiplier to calculate maximum HP (Physical × multiplier). Realistic: 3, Standard: 4, Heroic: 5+

ManaMultiplier.Name: Mana Multiplier
ManaMultiplier.Hint: Multiplier to calculate maximum Mana (Intelligence × multiplier). Only if magic is active.

DefaultCharacterType.Name: Default Character Type
DefaultCharacterType.Hint: Defines the skill pyramid that will be applied to new characters.

CustomPyramidMenu.Name: Configure Custom Pyramid
CustomPyramidMenu.Label: Configure Pyramid
CustomPyramidMenu.Hint: Opens a form to define a custom skill pyramid.
CustomPyramidMenu.Title: Custom Pyramid Configuration
CustomPyramidMenu.Description: Define how many skills of each level characters will have. You can use presets or create your own distribution.

AttributePoints.Name: Attribute Points
AttributePoints.Hint: Amount of points available to distribute in attributes. Realistic: 22, Heroic: 30, Epic: 35+

AutoCalculateDefense.Name: Auto Calculate Defense
AutoCalculateDefense.Hint: If active, Defense is calculated automatically (Dexterity + Dodge + 5). If inactive, can be edited manually.

Warnings.MagicDisabled: Magic is not enabled in this world. Activate it in system settings.
Warnings.CarismaDisabled: Charisma is not enabled in this world. Activate it in system settings.
Warnings.NoActor: This item is not associated with any actor
Warnings.EmptyPyramid: Pyramid cannot be empty. Define at least one skill.

Warnings.SkillPyramidMismatch: Level {level}: expected {expected} skills, but there are {actual}
Warnings.SkillsAbovePyramid: Level {level}: there are {actual} skills above the pyramid maximum
Warnings.NotEnoughExperience: You don't have enough experience to perform this action
Warnings.NotEnoughMana: You don't have enough mana to cast this spell
Warnings.CannotEquip: This type of item cannot be equipped
Warnings.NotASkill: This item is not a skill
Warnings.NotASpell: This item is not a spell
Warnings.MaxSkillLevel: Skill is already at maximum level (10)
Warnings.MinSkillLevel: Skill is already at minimum level (0)
Warnings.NoWeaponSkill: Could not determine appropriate skill for this weapon
Warnings.CannotActInCurrentState: You cannot act in your current state
Warnings.NoRangeSelected: No range selected for ranged attack

Info.AreaSpell: Area spell with radius {radius}. Select targets manually or it will be applied automatically.
Info.NoTargetsForDamage: No targets selected. Only attack roll is shown.
Info.NoTargetsSelected: No targets selected. Spell will be cast without applying effects.
Info.NoTargetsForMultiple: No targets selected. Spell requires {count} targets.
Info.NoTargetsForBuff: No targets selected to apply buff.

Notifications.ExperienceGained: You gained {amount} XP for {reason}. Total: {total} XP
Notifications.ShortRest: {name} has rested briefly and recovered {amount} HP
Notifications.LongRest: {name} has rested completely and recovered all health and mana

Dialogs.DeleteItemConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
Dialogs.RemoveEffectConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove effect {name}?

RYF.DamageNote: Armor absorbs damage according to its protection
RYF.SpellDamageNote: Magical damage can be absorbed by armor depending on type
